RECREATIONAL_STORE.summary: It is legal for adults 21 and older to buy cannabis in a store in New Jersey. The Cannabis Regulatory, Enforcement Assistance, and Marketplace Modernization (CREAMM) Act authorizes adults to purchase cannabis from licensed dispensaries, which have been operational since April 21, 2022. Purchases require valid government-issued ID, are limited to one ounce per transaction, and are available to both residents and visitors.

Patients who are registered with the New Jersey Medicinal Cannabis Program and possess a valid Medical Cannabis Program identification card may legally possess up to 3 ounces (85 grams) of cannabis within a 30-day period, as authorized by their healthcare provider.
